title: [1.16.3-1.10.2][Sound Physics——物理声效][永久更新][授权搬运]
author: yuudachi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 yuudachi 于 2020-10-13 14:57 编辑 

MOD简介【该MOD官方已停止开发，该贴目前搬运分支用户djpadbit二次开发的作品】
Sound Physics是通过重铸Minecraft的声音引擎来达到模拟混响、声音遮挡/吸收和声音的物理衰减。他可以提供有趣的听觉指示，例如闭上眼你能知道一个敌对生物是否能直接看到，或在一个封闭的拐角。探索洞穴将更加有沉浸感。
食用注意！1.该MOD帖标题下“原帖地址”为首发地址，最新更新地址标注在“MOD简介”中；
2.本帖仅对诸多Fork用户中其中更新最频繁的进行搬运，并不对其他Fork用户开发质量进行评价；
3.Fork用户的二次开发（改进）方向并不代表最初作者的想法；
4.原则上不搬运版本号相同但作者不同的作品，如有该情况发生则会在下载地址中表明。
分支关系说明sonicether(原始版本)
    ┗daipenger
          ┗djpadbit
MOD演示（youtube官方）https://youtu.be/qOQNSZBzD9Q
安装方式下载MOD压缩包将压缩包内的.jar放入mods文件夹下载SE SoundFix的.zip包（如果有提供）将SE SoundFix的.zip包放入材质包文件夹（如果有提供）启动游戏，加载SE SoundFix材质包（如果有提供）可以在MOD设置中对该MOD的参数进行修改

帖子更新历史2020.10.13 - 1.16.3/1.15.2/1.12.2更新1.0.10 Patch 1
2020.09.14 - 1.12.2更新1.0.10
2020.06.30 - 1.12.2更新1.0.9
2019.12.03 - 1.12.2更新1.0.8 Patch 1
2019.08.27 - 1.12.2更新1.0.8以上记录为djpadbit用户更新记录2017.09.16 - 1.12.2/1.12.1更新1.0.4 Rolloff
2017.08.18 - 1.12.1更新1.0.4
2017.07.30 - 1.11.2更新1.0.2；1.12更新1.0.4以上记录为daipenger[原名:Gregosteros]用户更新记录2017.02.23 - 首次发布
1.0.5+更新历史（djpadbit版）Sound Physics 1.0.10 Patch 1
Versions：
I'll try to keep the 1.15.2 and 1.16.3 versions a bit more up to date and release it alongside the 1.12.2 version for now on. (I don't know for how long it'll last)
Fixed：
#44 (Elytra hanging the game)
Elytra sound not working in 1.15.2
Underwater ambiance sounds being converted in 1.15.2
Sound Physics 1.0.10
Added：
Echo on sounds (can be configured with the Global Echo Multiplier setting)
IC2 Compatibility
Changed：
Updated Forge to 14.23.5.2847
Unifed setLastSoundCategory & setLastSoundName
Fixed：
#31 (Cubic Chunks compatibility)
#36 (Reverb in The Midnight)
#42 (Crash inside sound downmixer)
Fix Dynamic Surroudings multiplying sound volume again
Sound Physics 1.0.9
Added：
Global Volume Multiplier config option
Changed：
Removed Dynamic Envrionement Evaluation (for now)
Global Volume Multiplier now only applies to affected sounds (Can be changed in config)
Fixed：
#25
#27
#29
#30
Sound Physics 1.0.8 Patch 1
Fixed :
Dynamic Surroundings not properly working on versions 3.5.x.x
Muffled snow footstep sounds
IR 1.7.0+ compatiblity
Changed :
Simplifed the snow air absorbtion
Sound Physics 1.0.8
Added :
Immersive Railroading compatibility
Exception catching in the environment evaluation
Fixed :
Computronics sounds being muffled on servers without Sound Physics
Soulsand step sounds being muffled
Client mod rejection with Sound Physics on server
Null entity sounds crashing the game
Changed :
Sound Physics now uses a proper logger rather than just printing to stdout
Sound Physics now uses an AT rather than trying to read a private field with FieldUtils
The number of ray bounces config has been removed as it was useless
Sound Physics 1.0.7
Note : 
If you are on a server with Computronics that doesn't have Sound Physics and you have it, you should probably deactivate the Computronics patching as it will sound muffled. (fixed in next release)
Added :
Server support (still kind of experimental but should work). It will allow sounds to be heard from a lot further away and fix computronics because the new fixes are only possible on the server side
Config for max ray distance
Fixed :
Only the harp note block sound gets processed
Computronics sounds positions, now sounds come from where they are supposed to (In front of the speaker)
Dynamic environement evaluation thing again
Shouldn't straight up crash the game anymore if the sound system didn't load correctly
Known bugs :
Computronics can have muffled sounds if only the client has Sound Physics. (fixed in next release)
Sound Physics 1.0.6
Added :
Snow absorption, now when it's snowing sounds will get slightly muffled (can be turned off in settings)
Note blocks are now affect by Sound Physics (can be changed in settings)
More config options for logging and debugging. Also moved stereo downmix logging to the misc section
Fixed :
Dynamic environement evaluation thing (i still wouldn't recommend using it, especially with computronics sounds playing)
Computronics sounds cutting off way too fast when getting too far from the source
Known bugs :
Only the harp note block sound gets processed (Already fixed in next release)
Sound Physics 1.0.5 Patch 2
Quick bugfix again :
Fixed new dynamic surroundings version's sounds not getting recognised (quick and dirty hack, needs work)
Sound Physics 1.0.5 Patch 1
Quick bugfix :
Fixed bug where sounds with "ui" in their name such as the liquid sounds didn't get converted
Sound Physics 1.0.5
Added :
Computronics compatibility
Automatic stero to mono downmixing
Dynamic environnement evaluation (disabled by default, would not recommend)
1.0.4-更新历史（daipenger[原名:Gregosteros]版）Sound Physics 1.0.4
Rolled back d14442e
The complaints about fixing #8 have now outnumbered a tolerable extent, see #20, #17 and also #8 itself
You can read more about the technical side here
You now need the sound fix ressource pack again! You can download it here! The old v0.1 does not work anymore, download this one instead!
You have to convert all your custom sounds to mono again!
Removed all logging stuff
Default material absorption values altered, Jukeboxes will be ignored now
Sound Physics 1.0.4
Startup is faster now
Fixed the pesky bug related
Do not use the SoundFix pack and do not convert everything to mono anymore!
However: The bug fix also means that sound volume now decreases linearly again. Sorry, the whole bug was actually an OpenAL bug that SonicEther was willingly taking. In my opinion it sounds better in some cases, (TNT now has some power!) a bit more dull in other cases. (very far away sounds and all near sounds)
Sound Physics 1.0.3
Early update to 1.12, compatible with Forge 2334.
Sound Physics 1.0.1
The main algorithm is cleaner and more optimized right now, but is in needed of rethinking
(Raytracing contains some bugs when sounds come from block positions and the first step of the algorithm, line of sight raytracing from the source to the player, is not well thought through)
Removed yet another set of unneeded methods
// I will leave it in this state right now and come back when MC 1.12 is released
Sound Physics 1.0.0
Directly updated to 1.11.2 (ASM Injection code uses new mappings for 1.11.2)
Already contains a lot of cleanup! (The original code had unused classes, methods and imports and did calculations that were then not used)
自行魔改须知如果你想自行添加一些声效，请确保你的音效文件是单声道。
